item.title: Video Editor and Social Media Manager for Golf Clothing Brand - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
I am in the process of launching a Golf Clothing Brand and are seeking a talented individual to handle video editing and social media management. As we prepare to build our brand's online presence, we require someone who can create engaging content for platforms such as YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc. The ideal candidate will have a passion for golf and be able to curate content that resonates with our target audience.

Responsibilities:
Edit and produce high-quality videos related to golf, including but not limited to product showcases, instructional content, and promotional videos.
Manage social media platforms including YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc.
Create and curate engaging content that aligns with the brand's identity and resonates with our target audience.
Develop and implement social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement.
Monitor and analyze social media performance metrics and adjust strategies accordingly.
Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure consistency across all marketing channels.

Requirements:
Proven experience in video editing and social media management, preferably within the golf or sports industry.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Strong understanding of social media platforms and trends.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Passion for golf would be great and knowledge of the golf industry is highly desirable.

Additional Information:
This is a remote position with flexible working hours.
Compensation will be based on experience and negotiated upon discussion.
If you are passionate about golf and have the skills to help us build our brand's online presence, we'd love to hear from you! Please include samples of your previous work and let us know why you'd be a great fit for this role.
